column5: {"keywords_english":{"3":"Locking Mechanism","2":"High-frequency connectors","1":"RF Coaxial Connectors"},"keywords":{"3":"Locking Mechanism","2":"High-frequency connectors","1":"RF Coaxial Connectors"}}
column6:
High-frequency connectors are used to connect printed circuit boards, cables and devices, enabling very high frequencies to be transmitted. It is crucial that a consistent wave resistance (impedance) is maintained in the transmission system. The diversity ranges from miniature to large and even heavy connectors - these must always function reliably no matter how tough the conditions. Not only are the connectors essential for enabling existing and future technologies, they must be able to adapt to ecological and economic conditions, withstand ever-increasing transmission rates, and continually satisfy demands for performance and reliability. Such requirements apply across all sectors, whether communication, medicine, industry, automotive, consumer goods, or other higth-tech applications. 
 Locking Mechanism Locking devices prevent the possibility of unintentional disconnection by ensuring the contacts are always securely connected. The contact connection is guaranteed to withstand mechanical stress. 
 Rosenberger Group's product portfolio includes, amongst others:
[LIST] - Screw-on locking mechanism - Slide-on locking mechanism - Magnetic self-mating locking mechanism - Snap-on locking mechanism - Quick-lock mechanism [END LIST] 
 Coaxial Connectors - Catalog pdf

column5: {"keywords_english":{"1":"Spring Loaded Coax System","2":"Test and Measurement","3":"Quick Board Characterization"},"keywords":{"1":"Spring Loaded Coax System","2":"Test and Measurement","3":"Quick Board Characterization"}}
column6:
Test and measurement applications 
 Quick board characterizations 
 Applications where the DUT changes frequently

Immer höhere Packungsdichten und stetig steigende Signalgeschwindigkeiten bei Halbleiter-Bauelementen lassen es zunehmend schwieriger werden, zu testende Bauteile (DUT – Device Under Test) mit der erforderlichen Signaltreue (Signal Integrity) zu kontaktieren. Traditionelle Federkontaktstifte – produziert mit klassischen Fertigungsmethoden – können nicht im erforderlichen Maß minimiert werden. 
 Deshalb kommt bei Rosenberger das so genannte LIGA-Verfahren (Lithographie, Galvanik, Abformung) zum Einsatz: Mit Hilfe von Methoden aus der Halbleiterfertigung werden sehr kleine und gleichermaßen komplexe Mechanismen produziert. Ein mit dem LIGA-Verfahren gefertigter MCI-Kontaktstift (Monolithic Compliant Interconnect-Kontaktstift) kann Strukturelemente in einem Größenbereich von 10 µm aufweisen; darüber hinaus werden die mechanischen und elektrischen Eigenschaften aufgrund der speziellen Geometrie des Kontaktstiftes optimiert. Rosenberger fertigt mit dem LIGA-Verfahren aktuell beispielsweise eine Produktreihe von Prüfspitzen explizit für Mikrowellen-Wafer und PCB-Testsysteme. 
 Diese patentierte Technologie stellt hochpräzise Messungen mit geringem Kontaktwiderstand und ausgezeichneter Impedanzkontrolle sicher. Es erfolgt lediglich ein Übergang des Hochfrequenz-Mikrowellensignals auf die koplanare Kontaktstruktur innerhalb des geschirmten, luftisolierten Prüfspitzenkörpers. Dadurch wird die Signalintegrität bei konstanter Leistung in einem Temperaturbereich von 10 K bis 300 °C aufrechterhalten. 
 Das Kontaktieren des Prüflings mit Rosenberger-Prüfspitzen ist unkompliziert, reproduzierbar und erfordert wesentlich weniger Overtravel als bisher. Der Grund dafür liegt sowohl in dem robusten Design der koplanaren Kontaktstruktur, als auch im Entfallen des Micro-Koaxkabels in der Prüfspitze. 
 Merkmale der Rosenberger-Prüfspitzen:
[LIST] - Frequenzbereich: Gleichstrom bis 67 GHz - Hochleistung 16 W bei 5 GHz - Standard-Rastermaße: 50 µm bis 2.500 mm - Kontaktzyklen: > 1.000.000 [END LIST] 
 MCI-Kontaktelemente werden in einem Galvanoformungsprozess gefertigt. Sie erfüllen höchste Präzisionsanforderungen bei gleichzeitig kleinem Formfaktor, denn das Metall wird in einem additiven Verfahren aufgebaut. Rosenberger ist mit diesem Vorgehen in der Lage, Teile im Mikromaßstab mit einer Detailtiefe bis zu 3 µm abzubilden. 
 Das Additivverfahren ermöglicht die Entwicklung extrem kleiner und präzise definierter Formen, die wiederholgenau produziert werden können. Dabei bildet die exakt definierte Geometrie die Grundlage für ein kompaktes und zuverlässiges Design – von Rosenberger maßgeschneidert für den individuellen Anwendungsfall. Denn die Rosenberger-Gruppe verfügt über langjährige Erfahrung und Kompetenz in der Entwicklung und Fertigung von Mikro-Bauteilen. Dabei kommen in den unternehmenseigenen Produktionsstätten innovative Werkzeuge für Design, Simulation und Verifikation zum Einsatz. 
 Klassische Anwendungsbeispiele der gefertigten Teile sind Interposer oder Board-to-Board Verbindungen. 
 Was zeichnet Rosenberger-Produkte aus?
[LIST] - Hohe Zuverlässigkeit und Lebensdauer - Ausgezeichnete Signalintegrität - Hohe Packungsdichte - Präzise Kontaktkraft - Geringer und stabiler Kontaktwiderstand [END LIST]

The demand for circular connectors has increased significantly due to the boom in the automation industry. As more and more sensors and actuators are integrated into machine and system installations, circular connectors have become the preferred connection approach. Various designs based on IEC 61076 are available enabling complete installation solutions in harsh industrial environments – from the control cabinet to the sensor. These include overmolded cable assembies, PCB and panel mount connectors in different variants and hybrid solutions. 
 The circular connector portfolio continues to evolve, creating new applications and industries. They are used not only for the classic connection of sensors, but also for power supply. 
 One common feature connects all variants: their standardized and robust suitability for industrial use.

column4: [{"catId":616850,"catPath":"Planning, engineering and development => Engineering Services => Engineering Services (Other)","catUrl":"https://vtyler.alibaba.com/vtyler/index.htm?categoryId=616850"}]
column5: {"keywords_english":{"3":"Automotive Wiring Systems","2":"High-Speed Connectors","1":"Rosenberger Custom Assembly"},"keywords":{"3":"Automotive Wiring Systems","2":"High-Speed Connectors","1":"Rosenberger Custom Assembly"}}
column6:
Idea/Concept 
 Every Solution Starts with an Idea. The development of new ideas and their development towards implementable solutions that add value is part of Rosenberger's customer promise. Based on your technical and commercial specifications, an overall concept for the realization of your product is created. In addition to the fulfillment of electrical and mechanical requirements, Rosenberger also selects the suitable technologies to transform your idea to reality. 
 Design/Part Selection 
 Rosenberger selects all electrical and mechanical components according to relevancy and function and ensures the derivability of the components over the planned project duration. 
 Modern design and simulation tools reduce the number of design cycles and accelerates the development time. 
 Mechanical Construction 
 Through the integration of electrical and mechanical development, the design can be verified prior to prototyping. 
 All design, material, environmental and compliance requirements are determined at this stage. 
 Prototyping/Verification Practicability 
 Electrical prototypes are manufactured on serial production lines to find a ready-to-use design at an early development stage. Mechanical components (e.g., housing, control elements and connectors) can be produced by rapid-prototyping method. 
 Environmental tests and preliminary conformity measures in the product development phase guarantees that your product meets the necessary standards and requirements within the product series. 
 Test/Certification 
 All major electrical and mechanical tests are carried out in Rosenberger's specialized laboratory, including EMC and signal integrity. 
 Product certifications are carried out in cooperation with internationally accredited laboratories. 
 Serial Production/Logistics 
 The manufacturing process is developed according to your specifications, including manual assembly in semi or fully automatic production. 
 In addition to the series production, Rosenberger also takes responsibility of the complete supply chain. 
 Rosenberger scalable multiheaders combine multipin configurations with coaxial and differential high-speed connectors for future-proof automotive wiring systems. They enable all connector combinations for data transmission and power supply in the smallest space, with the lowest weight at the best price/performance ratio. Depending on the design, they combine a variety of electrical contacts, e. g. MQS with coaxial and differential data connectors such as HFM®, H-MTD® or RosenbergerHSD®. 
 All customized assembly combinations are explicitly designed for the respective application. 
 The networking of products and services usually requires not only customized hardware but also specific firmware and software, e.g. mobile apps. Rosenberger supports the customer with the conception and specification creation, carries out the development according to customer requirements and industrializes the entire system up to the turnkey handover. We support the integration of the product into the customer's existing IT landscape by providing the appropriate interfaces. 
 When developing IoT applications, we use tried and tested solution modules that have proven themselves in practice. In addition, we are also the competent partner when it comes to connecting machines or products in the field.

Rosenberger fertigt Steckverbinder, die so entwickelt sind, dass sie Daten und Strom in zahlreichen Anwendungen mit unterschiedlichsten Anforderungen zuverlässig übertragen. Ob es sich um hohe Datenraten, kleinste Baugrößen oder spezielle Anforderungen wie nicht magnetische Materialien oder spezielle Kopplungsmechanismen handelt, Rosenberger bietet standardisierte und kundenspezifische Steckverbindungslösungen, die diese Anforderungen erfüllen.

Rosenberger bietet ein breites Spectrum an kostengünstigen, hochwertigen und präzisen Produkten für industrielle Messtechnik-Anwendungen. Die Produkte ermöglichen die Kalibrierung, Verifizierung und Rückverfolgbarkeit der Kalibrierung sowie die Nutzung von Messuhren und Messuhren-Kits für Vektor-Netzwerk-Analysatoren (VNAs). 
 Kalibrier-Kits von Rosenberger übertreffen höchstmögliche Anforderungen und können von Gleichstrom bis zu ihrer Maximalfrequenz verwendet werden. Die Kits bieten verschiedene Versionen wie „Full“, „Industrial“, „Airline“, „Adapter" und „Kompakt-Kalibrier-Kits“, jede mit unterschiedlichen Funktionen und Möglichkeiten für verschiedene Messungen und Kalibrierungen. 
 Verifizier-Komponenten werden mit einem Netzwerkanalysator elektrisch geprüft und charakterisiert, wobei die Messungen auf messtechnische Standards wie die PTB oder das NIST zurückgeführt werden können. 
 Gauge-Kits von Rosenberger werden in robusten Holzkisten geliefert, einschließlich einer Stecker- und einer Kuppler-Messuhr. Jedes Kalibrier-Kit wird mit einem Zertifikat des Rosenberger-eigenen Kalibrierlabors geliefert: Die Standardkalibrierung ist die Werkskalibrierung. Optional kann eine akkreditierte Kalibrierung nach DAkkS (Deutsche Akkreditierungsstelle) nach DIN EN ISO/IEC 17025:2018 durchgeführt werden, nach der Rosenberger zertifiziert ist.

column5: {"keywords_english":{"3":"56 Gbps Automotive Ethernet","2":"Modular Twisted-Pair Data System","1":"H-MTD® High-Speed Connector"},"keywords":{"3":"56 Gbps Automotive Ethernet","2":"Modular Twisted-Pair Data System","1":"H-MTD® High-Speed Connector"}}
column6:
H-MTD® – High-Speed Modular Twisted-Pair Data 
 Rosenberger H-MTD®, H-MTD®+ and H-MTD®e are differential connector systems up to 20 GHz for high-speed data transmission of up to 56 Gbps, contained in a compact yet robust automotive grade housing. Apart from ensuring high-bitrate data transmission, savings on installation space and weight, a further major advantage of this connector system is its modularity, providing the flexibility to support a wide range of Ethernet applications and industry protocols. 
 The application field of the Rosenberger H-MTD® is countless as it can be used with a variety of different cables including Shielded Twisted Pair, Unshielded Twisted Pair and new High-Performance cables. With H-MTD® the customer can count on an interface that accommodates future vehicle networks, applications and protocols. 
 Rosenberger H-MTD® is compliant to all common automotive standards. 
 Connector Position Assurance – CPA prevents Unintentional Disengagement 
 High-speed data connectors are increasingly required in safety applications such as autonomous driving and driver assistance systems. In response, Rosenberger has developed an optional CPA (Connector Position Assurance) solution which improves connection reliability. The CPA cannot be activated if the connector has not been completely mated. When aligned correctly the CPA can be closed. 
 Additional Products 
 Additional products are available on request. 
 H-MTD® Series Codes 
 
 H-MTD® Series Code: E6 
 H-MTD®+ Series Code: 99 
 H-MTD®e Series Code: E9

Rosenberger SMP Infinity 
 The innovative and highly compact PCB connector series with a one-step locking mechanism for delivering maximum performance for a wide range of applications up to 40 GHz. The series is available as cable, PCB and bulkhead connectors, as well as test adaptors and cable assemblies. 
 
 PCB connectors (solder, SMD) 
 Cable connectors 
 Panel connectors 
 Test adaptors 
 Cable assemblies 
 
 Features 
 
 One-step locking mechanism – low insertion force, similar to SMP limited detent types 
 One-piece connector with pre-assembled inner conductor 
 Minimized dimensions – 40 % smaller than standard SMA screw types 
 Disconnecting – one tool for horizontal and vertical disconnecting 
 Fast and easy disconnection despite high retention force 
 Automatic and cost-effective assembly with tape and reel packaging options 
 
 Applications 
 SMP Infinity for multiple and complex PCB applications similar to SMP series in telecommunication, test & measurement, industrial, defence or aerospace applications.

Rosenberger RPC-1.85 precision connectors – with 50 Ω impedance and 1.85 mm outer conductor diameter – are designed for test & measurement applications up to 70 GHz. Delivering outstanding reliability and repeatability performance they are intermateable with common 1.85 mm series and V connectors as well as with RPC-2.40 connectors. 
 This comprehensive product range is suitable for semi-rigid cables and microwave components and includes cable, panel and PCB connectors, adaptors and test & measurement accessories – including RPC-1.85 calibration kits, cables assemblies, measurement equipment, attenuators, sliding loads and airlines. 
 
 
 Cable connectors - Panel connectors - PCB connectors (soldering and solderless) - Adaptor (coaxial and waveguide) - Test port adaptors and test port cables for VNA applications - Test cables & cable assemblies - Calibration, verification & gauge kits - Measurement equipment (open, short, load, terminations) - Airlines & DC blocks - Ruggedized versions - Tools & accessories

column3: Rosenberger FAKRA* industry standard compatible connectors
column5: {"keywords_english":{"1":"FAKRA connectors","2":"automotive telematics","3":"high-frequency applications"},"keywords":{"1":"FAKRA connectors","2":"automotive telematics","3":"high-frequency applications"}}
column6:
Rosenberger FAKRA* industry standard compatible connectors are designed to fulfill the rigorous mechanical and environmental requirements of the automotive industry. Ensuring maximum electrical and mechanical performance, these high quality FAKRA connectors feature specific color coded plastic housings in accordance with the FAKRA coding industry standard. Thirteen distinct mechanical and color codes enable easy identification and unique keying to avoid mis-mating and additional one neutral coding. 
 Combining Rosenberger’s turned part production expertise and FAKRA SF stamped and formed technology these precision manufactured products are ideally suited for process-safe and fully automated assembly by harness makers – leading to a significant reduction in production costs. 
 
 FAKRA = Fachkreis Automobil (Automobile Expert Group) 
 
 Rosenberger FAKRA connectors are used as standard interfaces for high-frequency telematic applications in vehicles where the number one priority is to ensure safety. For example, in autonomous driving and driver assistance systems where it is necessary to determine exact positioning, continuously calculate routes, and detect and classify objects. High data volumes from several cameras, various sensors and navigation sources must therefore be combined and transmitted in real time. 
 
 Cameras 
 Sensors for detection, evaluation and reaction 
 High Performance Computing 
 Radio antenna 
 GPS telematics or navigation 
 Infotainment & television 
 Mobile communication 
 RF bluetooth / WLAN applications 
 Radio frequency remote control for keyless entry 
 Vehicle auxiliary heating

Rosenberger is an experienced and established manufacturer of components for semiconductor test and measurement solutions. The company recognizes not only the challenges involved with latest developments in high-speed, high-precision and scanning testing, but also the associated requirements of its customers. 
 Rosenberger Group therefore offers a comprehensive and flexible product portfolio for serving the following areas: Multiport mini-coax connectors and cable assemblies for applications up to 40 GHz, spring contact coax products, test probes and customer-defined cable assemblies for modern chip test systems. Also available are powerful "coaxial-to-circuit board" transitions with high packing density and low losses, as well as cable assemblies – optimized for digital high-speed tests.

column3: Test & Measurement Equipment for Automotive Data Connectors
column5: {"keywords_english":{"3":"High-Speed Signal Transmission","2":"Automotive Data Connectors","1":"Test & Measurement Equipment"},"keywords":{"3":"High-Speed Signal Transmission","2":"Automotive Data Connectors","1":"Test & Measurement Equipment"}}
column6:
The automotive industry faces continuously growing challenges—both in high-speed data transmission and in the reliable measurement of interference in high-voltage traction networks of electric and hybrid vehicles. 
 On the one hand, modern vehicles require high-performance connectors that ensure secure, fast, and interference-free signal transmission. On the other hand, high-voltage components must be tested under realistic conditions to precisely detect and analyze electromagnetic interference (EMI), for example. New technologies and standards call for innovative test equipment and highly precise measurement methods to ensure the quality and safety of these complex systems. As a development partner with extensive expertise, the Rosenberger Group designs and manufactures high-quality precision products for measurement technology applications—custom-tailored to meet the demands of the automotive industry. 
 Therefore Rosenberger developed test equipment and accessories for coaxial and differential automotive connector series, e.g. FAKRA, HFM®, RMC® and RosenbergerHSD®, H-MTD®, MTD®. 
 The ongoing standardization of high-speed connections in the automotive industry enables a robust and long-lasting implementation within the proven "building-block strategy" approach. This allows automakers to establish a reliable multi-vendor and second-source procurement strategy. A critical success factor in this process is the use of a precisely tuned simulation framework based on worst-case models. This approach helps eliminate fragmented or inconsistent limits within the cabling supply chain for most high-speed protocols. At the same time, it provides a solid foundation for functional safety assessments. Clear responsibilities and liability assignments throughout the entire wiring harness supply chain further enhance process security. To ensure flawless and high-performance signal transmission, specialized test adapters for automotive connectors are essential. They enable precise measurements and comprehensive validation for a wide range of applications – from development to production and quality assurance. 
 Rely on customized test adapters for your high-speed data transmission and benefit from maximum reliability and efficiency in your automotive development!

Rosenberger multiheaders combine multipin configurations with coaxial and differential high-speed connectors for future-proof automotive wiring systems. They enable all connector combinations for data transmission and power supply in the smallest space, with the lowest weight at the best price/performance ratio. Depending on the design, they combine a variety of electrical contacts, e. g. MQS with coaxial and differential data connectors such as HFM®, H-MTD® or RosenbergerHSD®. 
 All customized assembly combinations are explicitly designed for the respective application. Rosenberger develops the interfaces according to the requirements of automotive manufacturers and Tier 1 suppliers. Rosenberger offers everything from one source including modular cable connectors and cable assemblies as well as modular PCB connectors. 
 Rosenberger scalable multiheaders enable various connector combinations for data transmission and power supply, e.g. electrical MQS contacts with coaxial data connectors such as FAKRA, HFM®, RMC®, as well as differential interfaces like H-MTD® or RosenbergerHSD®. 
 Rosenberger Automotive Scalable Multiheader Connection System 
 Scalable multiheaders reduce weight and size. Design and production according to customer specification. Every conceivable modular design is possible. Combination of data and power connectors as specified. Simplified, fast connection and disconnection of complex signal lines. The modular concept enables a fully automated assembly process. Application-specific implementations due to modular and scalable design in the smallest installation space. Design and process perfectly aligned for future automotive market requirements and applications. Cost efficient. 
 Automotive Ethernet - SerDes / LVDS - APIX® - PCIe® - GMSL™ - MIPI® - FPD-Link - GVIF - HDBaseT 
 For all applications and complex controls in the automotive wiring system - Video and audio technology - Wiring harnesses - Advanced Driver Assistance Systems (ADAS) - 4K cameras and displays - Infotainment.

RosenbergerHSD®®, RosenbergerHSD®+2, +4, +8 and RosenbergerHSD®t - High-Speed-Data connector systems up to 6 GHz commonly used in automotive industry applications. 
 RosenbergerHSD® is a homogeneous impedance-controlled interconnect system which directly addresses the high-speed data, low-voltage requirements of real-time automotive industry applications. Extremely compact and durable this 100 Ohm fully shielded interconnect system utilizes shielded twisted quad cables and features mechanical keying and latching for high connection retention, as well as coding to avoid misuse. Furthermore, these precision manufactured RosenbergerHSD® SF variants are ideally suited for process-safe and fully automated assembly by harness makers, facilitating a significant reduction in costs. Its high data throughput performance while also preventing interference from crosstalk and external sources makes the RosenbergerHSD® cable and PCB connector system the perfect choice for LVDS cameras, USB connections, Ethernet (IEEE 802.3) and Firewire (IEEE 1394) applications. In addition, it is well-suited to many other applications including those found in digital infotainment electronics and digital symmetrical networks – even radio base stations. 
 RosenbergerHSD®+2, +4, +8 power pin connectors – further variants with additional pins (MQS contacts) for power supply purposes. Power over HSD (PoH) is a concept for remote power supply, for example, to displays, cameras or similar devices. In addition to the data signal DC is transmitted on separate conductors in order to supply the terminal device with power. 
 RosenbergerHSD®t connectors using just one data pair, they are available in two versions to suit shielded as well as unshielded twisted pair cables. Featuring the well-known piece parts of the standard RosenbergerHSD® system they are very costefficient high-speed data connectors. Therewith there is now the possibility to introduce e.g. unscreened automotive Ethernet in cars based on 0.14 mm² (AWG26) cables with backward compatibility towards the screened RosenbergerHSD®t system.

These durable, resilient and customized connector systems are suitable for temperatures up to +450 °C. Rosenberger has the know-how of performing thermal and electrical simulations as well as processing high-temperature-proof materials such as ceramics and stainless steel. 
 Different components including cable assemblies, housing connectors and matched antenna systems are developed in close cooperation with our customers and partners. Customized solutions are available upon request.

 Rosenberger has the know-how of performing thermal and electrical simulations as well as processing high-temperature-proof materials for all customized requirements - A reliable connection in thermally harsh environments 
 
 
 Engine compartments - Boilers - Ovens - Customer specific solutions

Rosenberger offers a wide test port portfolio of cable assemblies, ruggedized adaptors and an interchangeable port system for vector network analyzers (VNA) up to 90 GHz: 
 Test port cables providing outstanding phase and amplitude stability are also available as sets containing two cables with a standard length of 60 cm each. The range is optimized for frequencies up to 12 GHz, 18 GHz, 26.5 GHz, 40 GHz, 50 GHz, 70 GHz and 90 GHz. VNA test port cables are also available as cable sets, containing two cables of 600 mm standard length, and are supplied in high-quality wooden boxes. 
 Test port adaptors are designed to connect directly to the VNA test port via a ruggedized coupling nut. They are available in the RPC-3.50, RPC-2.92, RPC-2.40, RPC-1.85 and RPC-1.35 connector series. Available as "in series" and "inter series" versions, their ruggedized construction ensures reliable protection of VNA test ports and reduces mechanical abrasion to a minimum. 
 Interchangeable port connectors are designed for test equipment applications using test ports that will be continually mated and re-mated. This has been achieved by the development of an interchangeable port connector system featuring a panel mounting half and an innovative neutral interface, allowing a high number of mating cycles without causing possible damage to the equipment device interface. 
 
 Variety of cable types and connector interfaces for a variety of industrial test & measurement applications

column5: {"keywords_english":{"3":"Ethernet connections","2":"Power over Ethernet","1":"Magnetic RJ45 Connector"},"keywords":{"3":"Ethernet-Verbindungen","2":"Power over Ethernet","1":"Magnetischer RJ45-Stecker"}}
column6:
Die Produktreihe Magnetic RJ45 von Rosenberger ermöglicht Daten- und Stromversorgung über eine einzige Verbindung und eignet sich hervorragend für Ethernet-Verbindungen und Anwendungen mit häufigen Steckzyklen. 
 Der innovative selbst-steckende und -verriegelnde Magnetstecker ist ideal für Anwendungen, bei denen häufiges Verbinden oder Trennen erforderlich ist und gewährleistet sichere Verbindungen, auch an schwer zugänglichen Stellen. Die einfache Reinigung der RJ45-Komponenten, ein robustes Gehäuse und die Steckvorgänge mit Magneten machen das Produkt zu einer äußerst langlebigen Lösung. Funktionen wie unkompliziertes Trennen, hohe Anzahl von Steckzyklen sowie kombinierte Strom- und LAN-Verbindungen sind Standard. 
 Daten und Strom über eine einzige Verbindung Bei Verwendung von PoE-kompatiblen LAN-Kabelgeräten (Power over Ethernet) ist nur diese eine Verbindung für die Übertragung von Daten und Strom erforderlich. 
 Magnetische Abreißfunktion Die Abreißfunktion dient zum Unterbrechen der Verbindung, wenn der Stecker oder das Kabel einer akuten (beabsichtigten oder unbeabsichtigten) Zugkraft ausgesetzt wird. Dies vermeidet die Verletzungsgefahr für den Benutzer und die Beschädigung der Steckverbinder oder Geräte. Auch das gezielte Entfernen des Steckers erfolgt durch die Abreißfunktion schnell und einfach.

column5: {"keywords_english":{"1":"Power Connectors","2":"Rosenberger","3":"High Current Voltage Connectors"},"keywords":{"1":"Power Connectors","2":"Rosenberger","3":"High Current Voltage Connectors"}}
column6:
Power connectors from Rosenberger can withstand high currents and voltages, making them suitable for various electrical drives in the automotive industry. These include hybrid or purer pure electric motors, as well as combustion engines, whereby the respective drive concept defines the necessary current and voltage class. They also come ready to use with power charging, quick charging and in ancillaries like climate processors. 
 The design of the connectors and the choice of materials are based on requirements. In addition to resilience and size optimization, maximum safety must be guaranteed due to the extreme voltages and currents. The customer's target parameters – including temperature, media and vibration loads – are delivered in a minimal space. 
 Power connectors from Rosenberger are also used in innovative mobile radio systems including 5G. Since the power requirement here is constantly increasing, power management is becoming an increasingly important task. Active RF technology such as Active Antenna Units (AAU's), Remote Radio Units (RRU's), Repeaters, HUB's or Gateways require a reliable power supply to actively amplify or process signals. Direct mounting on the masts requires robust, waterproof and corrosion-resistant connectors that are quick and easy to install and offer a high level of installation security. 
 Last but not least, power connectors from Rosenberger are used to charge batteries in LEVs, UGVs and drones. 
 Connector Systems for E-Mobility - Catalog pdf RoPD® & RoDC® Power and Data Transmission for LEV - Flyer pdf System Simulation according ZVEI (German) - Paper pdf Exact Measurement in HV Connectors - Paper (English) pdf

Im Krankenhaus sowie in Pflege- und Altenheimen nutzen Patienten und Bewohner moderne Entertainment- und Informationssysteme. Neben Telefonieren, Fernsehen, Radio hören und Filme streamen, surfen Patienten im Internet und nutzen verschiedene Applikationen, wie z. B. ein internes Rufsystem. 
 Des Weiteren liegt der Mehrwert vor allem in der innerklinischen Kommunikation zwischen Ärzten, Pflegepersonal und Patienten. Durch die Anbindung an das Krankenhaus-Informations-System können alle wichtigen Informationen (z. B. aus der elektronischen Patientenakte) unmittelbar am Krankenbett eingesehen werden. Die anschauliche Informationsvermittlung unterstützt den Pflegedienst und die Ärzte bei der Aufklärung der Patienten und ermöglicht die sofortige Umsetzung der erforderlichen Maßnahmen. Dadurch lassen sich Abläufe im klinischen Prozess effizienter steuern und die Behandlungsqualität insgesamt verbessern.

column5: {"keywords_english":{"3":"Break-Away Function","2":"Power over Ethernet","1":"Magnetic RJ45 Connector"},"keywords":{"3":"Break-Away-Funktion","2":"Power over Ethernet","1":"Magnetischer RJ45-Stecker"}}
column6:
The Rosenberger Magnetic RJ45 is an innovative magnetic connector solution for Ethernet connections. Ideal for applications where frequent connections and disconnections are necessary, the unique self-mating and locking magnetic plug ensures the right connection every time – even in the most inaccessible places. Ease of cleaning of the RJ45 components, a robust housing and the plug-in processes using magnets make the product a highly durable solution. The usual features such as ease of termination, high number of mating cycles, and combined power and LAN connections all come as standard. 
 Data And Power from A Single Connection One connection is all that’s required for transmission of both data and power when using Power over Ethernet (PoE) compatible LAN cable devices. 
 Magnetic Break-Away Function This safely terminates the connection should the plug or cable be subjected to an acute tensile force, accidentally or deliberately. Being tear-proof, it avoids the risk of injury to the user and damage to the plug connection. 
 The Rosenberger Magnetic RJ45 is available as an extension cable, either as a set or individually in different lengths and colors. 
 Safety due to break-away function – no damage to the device - Simple, safe and fast connection with magnet - High number of mating cycles - Full compatibility with existing installations - Robust plug/socket housing 
 Medical devices - Hospital infotainment - Industrial automation - IT LAN networks - Data centers

column5: {"keywords_english":{"3":"high-speed data transmission","2":"coaxial Mini-Coax automotive","1":"Rosenberger HFM connectors"},"keywords":{"3":"high-speed data transmission","2":"coaxial Mini-Coax automotive","1":"Rosenberger HFM connectors"}}
column6:
Rosenberger HFM® is the best performing system of coaxial “Mini-Coax” connectors for the automotive industry. For frequencies up to 20 GHz, the intelligent modular system ensures fast transmission of high data rates up to 28 Gbps. Its innovative design addresses the growing requirement for cost savings as well as reduced weight and size. Delivering space savings of up to 80 % compared to conventional FAKRA connectors, the Rosenberger HFM® connector system allows various modules to be accommodated in the smallest possible footprint. Best cost is based on fully stamped and formed manufacturing processes and automated connector mounting and cable assembly. With HFM® the customer can count on an interface that accommodates future vehicle networks, applications and protocols. The priority of autonomous driving and driver assistance systems is to ensure safety. It is required to determine exact positions, to continuously calculate routes and to detect and classify objects. High data volumes from several cameras, diverse sensors and navigation sources must be combined and transported for this purpose – in real time. Rosenberger HFM® is compliant to all common automotive standards. 
 
 Small dimensions – optimized used of space 
 Highest mechanical robustness 
 Modular system – saving installation space by as much as 80 % 
 Cost optimized 
 Real-time data transmission 
 CPA – optional Connector Position Assurance 
 Waterproof variants 
 
 Protocols, e.g.* 
 SERDES 
 
 
 APIX® - FPD-Link - GMSL™ - MIPI® A-PHY℠ - PCIe® - USB - GVIF - HDBase-T™ - ASA Motion Link [END LIST]
*further protocols on request 
 
 
 Autonomous Driving 
 
 
 Driver Assistance Systems 
 
 
 Navigation 
 
 
 Infotainment 
 
 
 Rear Seat Entertainment 
 
 
 Internet 
 
 
 WiGig (Wireless Gigabit) 
 
 
 HFM® Hand Crimping Tool Kits 
 AMW001-SET Cable group M4 Order no 365609 AMW007-SET Cable group 02 Order no 428412 AMW021-SET Cable group AX Order no 499987 
 Rosenberger has developed compact hand crimping tool kits for the quick replacement of damaged Rosenberger HFM connectors on the cable harness. These are used when individual connectors have been damaged, e.g. during car repairs in the workshop or on the assembly line during vehicle production, and need to be replaced manually on site.

7-16-Steckverbinder sind hochwertige Koaxial-Steckverbinder mit geringer Dämpfung und Intermodulation für Frequenzen bis 7,5 GHz. Sie eignen sich aufgrund ihrer hohen mechanischen Stabilität und ausgezeichneten Witterungsbeständigkeit für die Übertragung mittlerer bis hoher Leistungen für Außenanwendungen wie z. B. in der Mobilkommunikation. 
 Besonders geeignet zur hohen Leistungsübertragung für Outdoor-Anwendungen, z.B. Mobilfunkinfrastruktur, Antennenverkabelung.

Unshielded Rosenberger HVU®48 connector series in small dimensions for cable cross sections of 6 mm², 10 mm², 16 mm² are available in straight and inline variants as well as headers. They are characterized by a maximum current capacity of 87.5 A and a working voltage of 1000 V DC at a cable cross section of 16 mm². HVU®48 connectors are mainly used for charging sockets to OBC (AC).

column5: {"keywords_english":{"3":"7 mm microwave connectors","2":"hermaphroditic connectors","1":"Rosenberger RPC-7"},"keywords":{"3":"7 mm microwave connectors","2":"hermaphroditic connectors","1":"Rosenberger RPC-7"}}
column6:
Rosenberger RPC-7 “hermaphroditic” connectors with 7 mm diameter at outer contact are designed for precision measurements up to 18 GHz and are suitable for semi-rigid cables and microwave components. Mating electrically with center and outer conductor by end-surface (butt) contact, the mechanical connection is designed as a counter-sinkable threaded socket. For total flexibility, these low reflection connectors are intermateable with all common 7 mm series connectors including APC-7, PC-7, GPC-7 or Precifix AA. Furthermore, RPC-7 and RPC-N connector heads are interchangeable using the same bead type. 
 The wide product range comprises connectors and connector heads, adaptors, interchangeable port connectors, airlines as well as test & measurement accessories such as RPC-7 calibration and verification kits, test cables, attenuators or measurement equipment (open – short – load). 
 
 
 Cable connectors - Panel connectors - Adaptors - Test port adaptors and test port cables for VNA applications - Test cables & cable assemblies - Calibration and gauge kits - Measurement equipment (open, short, load, terminations) - Airlines - Tools & accessories 
 
 
 Intermateable with common 7 mm connectors - Screw-on/Threaded locking mechanism - Hermaphroditic – butted contact at center and outer contact - Low reflection - Reproducible 
 
 
 Precision measurements up to 18 GHz - Suitable for semi-rigid cables and microwave components

column3: Rosenberger Charging Solutions for Electric Vehicles
column6:
Für einen nachhaltigen und klimafreundlichen Verkehr mit besserer Luftqualität und weniger Lärm sind vor allem in den Ballungsräumen elektrische Klein- und Leichtfahrzeuge auf dem Vormarsch. LEVs (light electric vehicles) erweitern und ergänzen fortschrittliche Mobilitätsformen. 
 Genau das Richtige für das tägliche Pendeln: mit dem E-Bike von zu Hause zur S-Bahn und am Zielbahnhof mit dem E-Scooter weiter ins Büro. 
 LEVs sind ressourcenschonend und leise. Sie lassen sich leicht bedienen, erfordern in der Regel keine Fahrerlaubnis und bieten zudem Fahrspaß an der frischen Luft. Aufgeladen werden sie über das herkömmliche Stromnetz. 
 Um sicherzustellen, dass LEVs für Beschleunigungsvorgänge oder steile Anstiege ausreichend Strom zur Verfügung haben, ist ein schnelles, einfaches und sicheres Aufladen der Batterien Voraussetzung. Die Verbindungslösungen von Rosenberger sind darauf ausgelegt.

column5: {"keywords_english":{"1":"Rosenberger Automotive","2":"Connector Systems","3":"Customized Solutions"},"keywords":{"1":"Rosenberger Automotive","2":"Connector Systems","3":"Customized Solutions"}}
column6:
Rosenberger products stand for precision, durability and quality at the highest level. The company has considerable expertise in the automotive sector from two decades of designing and producing both customized solutions and standard products. In this challenging market, Rosenberger Automotive is firmly established as a development partner for connector systems and customer-specific solutions, offering the highest quality and best value for money. 
 The requirements of the automotive industry are high: For example, the production of contact systems demands a high level of expertise that, in addition to all technical specifications, places the highest priority on safety - such as in the areas of autonomous driving and driver assistance systems. 
 In addition to determining the exact vehicle position, routes have to be calculated continuously and reliably while also ensuring objects and obstacles are precisely identified and classified. Powerful computer systems are necessary for capturing and processing the large volume of data provided from camera systems, sensors (lidar, radar, infrared) and navigation sources - in real-time. 
 Rosenberger guarantees the quality of its products for automotive applications through innovative production solutions developed with state-of-the-art tools. The manufacture of individual parts and the assembly of cable solutions are performed using highly automated production processes with each step being checked for zero defects. 
 Such design expertise and manufacturing excellence has made Rosenberger the long-term partner of all well-known automobile manufacturers.

column5: {"keywords_english":{"3":"future-proof network","2":"pre-assembled cables","1":"LAN cabling systems"},"keywords":{"3":"future-proof network","2":"pre-assembled cables","1":"LAN cabling systems"}}
column6:
With our modern, standards-compliant, and extendable network solutions, your enterprise is well-equipped for the changes currently taking place in the working world. Whatever your requirements may be, the PreCONNECT® LAN cabling systems provide a high-performance network infrastructure with a range of flexibility options. 
 standards-compliant 
 All three available solutions adhere to DIN EN 50173. They align with a structured cabling solution or are enhanced by intelligent concepts to deliver greater performance and flexibility. 
 pre-assembled 
 Time- and cost-effective LAN cabling thanks to cables pre-assembled on one or both sides, based on local conditions. This leads to time savings of up to 50% at the installation site, depending on the chosen network solution. 
 flexible 
 You can choose between various levels of flexibility in the configuration of workspaces, as well as in the expansion of bandwidth and the customised assignment of data rates. 
 PreCONNECT® isoNET and PreCONNECT® flexNET are appropriate for average data traffic loads at the workplace. For higher loads, we recommend PreCONNECT® smartNET. 
 Do you have any further questions about our products? We would be happy to assist you. Contact us 
 Here you will find answers to various questions on the topic of LAN cabling. 
 What is more cost-efficient - fibre-optics or copper? 
 At first glance, copper might seem to be the better choice due to its more cost-effective and flexible technology. That is why we still use affordable, fully mature copper technology in tertiary-level building cabling – in particular to connect terminal devices. However, fibre optic cables offer greater future security, as they support higher bandwidths. PreCONNECT® smartNET is a future-proof LAN cabling solution that integrates both approaches. It combines the advantages of structured cabling with copper in the tertiary sector and fibre optics in the primary and secondary sectors. The result is a high degree of flexibility in the configuration of workspaces, as well as in expanding bandwidth and assigning data rates. This is coupled with strong investment protection, as the network solution is optimised for future-oriented technologies such as Power-over-Ethernet (PoE). 
 Where does copper cabling reach its limits? 
 Although copper cables can support 40G, this is only possible over distances of no further than 30 metres in their current specification. It now appears that structured copper cabling reaches its absolute performance limit in the tertiary sector at 100 metres, whereas fibre-optic cabling still has great potential for the future. For example, several hundred data signals can be transmitted in parallel over a 9-µm fibre. In contrast, a copper cable can only transmit a single signal. 
 What makes the PreCONNECT® smartNET concept so special? 
 Two characteristics set PreCONNECT® smartNET apart from conventional cabling systems. On the one hand, by using a passive optical fibre consolidation point in the secondary sector, which delivers future-proof fibre-optic technology to the end user in a more flexible manner. The second feature that makes this intelligent network solution so unique is the flexible integration of office distributors (OD) into the building architecture, as well as the IT application and process structure. 
 What are the advantages of pre-assembled LAN cabling systems? 
 All LAN cables in our PreCONNECT® systems are pre-assembled. This applies to both fibre-optic and copper products. Pre-assembled cables are measured at the factory. This means that all the installer has to do on-site is lay and connect them, resulting in a true plug-and-play installation. As a result, up to 50% of the installation time on-site can be saved, depending on the project, thereby reducing project completion time – a highly valuable commodit

column4: [{"catId":607311,"catPath":"Hardware for information and communication technology => Communication Systems => GPS Tracking Systems","catUrl":"https://vtyler.alibaba.com/vtyler/index.htm?categoryId=607311"}]
column5: {"keywords_english":{"3":"Real-Time Tracking","2":"GPS Asset Tracker","1":"TINO® Tracking Unit"},"keywords":{"3":"Real-Time Tracking","2":"GPS Asset Tracker","1":"TINO® Tracking Unit"}}
column6:
Maximum Reliability and Runtime with Lowest Energy Consumption 
 TINO® is a powerful GPS asset tracker with high weather-related reliability, specially designed to locate moving objects without power supply. In the absence of a satellite signal, real-timetracking is provided by cell localization. Transmission intervals can be parameterized by the user based on time and movement. 
 Integrated sensors support monitoring of temperature, movement and vibration. Device configurations can be changed individually via mobile communications during use. Customized IT backend systems can be connected to the TINO® via standardized interfaces. 
 Uncompromising, Robust and Scalable for use Worldwide 
 Driven by today’s geopolitical challenges, global supply chains are under pressure: Increasingly, companies must design logistics processes that ensure transported goods always reach their destinations on time and undamaged. 
 Compact Hardware Based on Precision Engineering 
 In a single tracking unit, TINO® combines the latest technologies with years of engineering and production expertise. 
 Customer-Specific Developments 
 The development of new ideas and their implementation into feasible solutions with added value is part of Rosenberger‘s customer promise. When developing telematics components, Rosenberger can call on tried-and-tested solution modules that have already proven themselves in practice. 
 In addition to meeting electrical and mechanical requirements, Rosenberger also selects the appropriate technologies to turn these requirements into reality. In close cooperation with the customer, Rosenberger develops tailor-made and targeted system solutions.

column5: {"keywords_english":{"3":"fiber optic modules","2":"modular tray system","1":"high-density cabling system"},"keywords":{"3":"fiber optic modules","2":"modular tray system","1":"high-density cabling system"}}
column6:
Combining serviceability with maximum flexibility 
 With VersaTray®, Rosenberger OSI is now able to offer an outstandingly modular, easy-to-maintain 19” tray system for high-density cabling solutions in data centres. The forward-looking design opens up hitherto unexploited possibilities for accessing the interior of the rack and applying the pay-as-you-grow principle.Since the design is based on the use of extensible tray elements and 1/3 HU drawers, the overall height of the tray system can be individually adapted to meet specific customer requirements. Thanks to the granularity of the overall system 1/3 HU, even the smallest installation spaces in the rack become productive. 
 The drawers have two pull-out positions to make the fibre optic modules inside them more accessible than in the past. The drawers can also be completely removed from the unit thanks to an innovative, easy-to-operate unlock mechanism. The drawer widths are subdivided 4/4 and 6/6, making it possible to accommodate modules of two different sizes. Both types of module are available as MTP® modules, coupler modules or alternatively as splice modules and can be equipped with all standard couplers (LC, SC, MDC, SN®, MTP®, MDC, E-2000®). 
 No tools are required when installing the modules thanks to the use of a uniquely designed leaf spring system. What is more, the modules can be installed from the front, back, top and even at an angle. Handling is greatly simplified by the fact that there is no need to align the modules precisely with their mounts. The patch cords are guided by height unit-independent patch cord guides which are located at the front of every module. In addition to the fibre optic connection technology variants listed above, VersaTray® also supports the transfer of electrical signals. The drawer developed for this function measures 2/3 HU and possesses mounts for RJ45 keystone modules as well as for keystone modules for fibre optic signal transmission. 
 
 Optimised access to the inside of the rack from the front of the rack thanks to innovative drawer support elements 
 Overall system extensible to accommodate any number of height units (HU) in steps of 1/3 HU (pay-as-you-grow) 
 The drawers are partially and fully retractable and can also be removed without the need for tools if required. 
 In the 1/3 HU design, the width of the drawers is subdivided 4/4 and 6/6 for the accommodation of fibre optic modules 
 In the 2/3 HU variant, the drawers possess mounts for RJ45 and fibre optic keystone modules 
 The unique leaf spring system makes it possible to insert and remove fibre optic modules from the front, back, top and even at an angle of the mounts 
 Fibre optic modules are available as MTP® modules, coupler modules and splice modules (single and ribbon fibres) for both the 4/4 and 6/6 drawer width layouts 
 Drawers with built-in height unit-independent patch cord guides 
 A trunk support can be installed independently of the usual distribution system and can be subsequently extended in steps of 1 HU, 2 HU and 4 HU

Rosenberger RPC-3.50 Präzisionssteckverbinder mit einem 3,50 mm Außendurchmesser enthalten ein Luftdielektrikum und sind auch in robusten „ruggedized“-Versionen erhältlich. Ihre hohe Spezifikation gewährleistet hervorragende und präzise Messergebnisse bei Microwave-Präzisionsmesstechnik-Anwendungen über den gesamten Frequenzbereich bis zu 26,5 GHz. Die Kabel sind standardmäßig entweder mit einem PE-Mantel für Außeninstallationen oder in einer schwer entflammbaren und halogenfreien Version erhältlich, die die Anforderungen für Gesundheit und Sicherheit in Innenräumen, IEC 60332 und CPR-EN 50575 erfüllen.

column3: Rosenberger RPC-SL Series Interchangeable Port Connectors
column5: {"keywords_english":{"3":"Rosenberger RPC-SL series","2":"test equipment connectors","1":"interchangeable port connectors"},"keywords":{"3":"Rosenberger RPC-SL series","2":"test equipment connectors","1":"interchangeable port connectors"}}
column6:
The Rosenberger RPC-SL series are interchangeable port connector systems for use with test equipment where test ports are frequently mated and re-mated. Under such heavy usage, Rosenberger RPC-SL interchangeable port connectors allow the equipment/device interface to be fully protected from potential damage, avoiding the risk of costly repairs. 
 The RPC-SL port connector includes a panel mounting half and a sexless interface which features two spring-loaded butt contacts. This ensures no wear occurs during mating and eliminates the possibility of accidental damage from mismatching of connector halves. Furthermore, the interface between the panel mount and the adaptor is slotted, preventing the mating faces from rotating and possible damage. 
 The RPC-SL portfolio offers both 26.5 GHz and 40 GHz versions. While adaptors can be interchanged and are available in different connector series, the connector heads in these two ranges are not compatible and can only be used with their own system. 
 Rosenberger offers a wide range of connector heads for test setups which often require other connector series, such as N, PC-7 or SMA. Due to the special cable interface, mounting of changeable connector heads is made very easy without any need for tools. Test cables can be readily adapted to the required connector types already available on the DUT (Device Under Test). 
 Allows the equipment/device interface to be fully protected from damage - Easy, fast and reliable connections 
 Developed for use with test equipment featuring a test port that will be continually mated and re-mated

Konfektionierte Hochfrequenz-Leitungen eignen sich zur dämpfungsarmen und verzerrungsfreien Übertragung von hochfrequenten Signalen. Die schnellste Übertragung von Daten erfolgt auf direktem Weg – konfektionierte Koax-Kabel von Rosenberger stellen die leistungsstarke und unkomplizierte Datenkommunikation sicher. Das geschirmte Design macht konfektionierte Koax-Kabel von Rosenberger deutlich unempfindlicher gegenüber externen Störungseinflüssen, wie Beschädigung oder elektromagnetischen Feldern. Kabelgebundene Lösungen eignen sich für hochkomplexe Infrastrukturen, dort wo Flexibilität, Sicherheit und Performance zählen, wie beispielsweise bei Messleitungen in Prüflaboren. Darüber hinaus finden sie aber auch Anwendung in der Elektro- und Funktechnik, in der Nachrichtenübertragung und der Datentechnik – also in allen Bereichen, in denen hohe Anforderungen an Übertragungsgüte oder Abschirmung gestellt werden. 
 Das Produktspektrum umfasst alle gängigen HF-Kabelassemblies und kundenspezifische Entwicklungen von DC bis 110 GHz.

The fastest transmission of data takes place directly which is why assembled coaxial cables from Rosenberger ensure powerful and uncomplicated data communication. The shielded design makes Rosenberger assembled coaxial cables far less sensitive to external interferences such as damage or electromagnetic fields. Wired solutions are suitable for highly complex infrastructures where flexibility, security and performance count, such as measurement lines in test laboratories. Furthermore, they are used in electrical and radio technology, communication and data technology – all areas where high demands on transmission quality or shielding are made. 
 The product range incorporates all commonly available RF cable assemblies and the development of customized solutions from DC up to 110 GHz.

column5: {"keywords_english":{"3":"Power Hybrid","2":"Coax Fiber Optics","1":"Interconnect Solutions"},"keywords":{"3":"Power Hybrid","2":"Koax Fiberoptik","1":"Interconnect Lösungen"}}
column6:
Eine globalisierte Welt setzt eine international vernetzte und funktionierende Kommunikationsinfrastruktur voraus. Die dafür benötigte Technik entwickelt sich mit rasender Geschwindigkeit weiter und bricht immer neue Übertragungsrekorde. 
 Künftige Technologien werden eine vollständig digitalisierte, automatisierte und programmierbare Welt ermöglichen. Darin kommunizieren nicht nur Menschen miteinander, indem sie Inhalte und Daten austauschen, sondern auch Maschinen, Dinge und Orte. Um all diese Anforderungen zu erfüllen, müssen Interconnect-Lösungen beste Übertragungseigenschaften besitzen, hohe Bandbreiten und Signalintegrität ermöglichen sowie zuverlässige EMV-Eigenschaften und ein robustes Design aufweisen. 
 Interconnect Lösungen finden sich unter anderem in Basisstationen bei aktiven und passiven Antennen und Radios sowie bei Testequipments und Infrastrukturlösungen. 
 Aufgrund jahrelanger Erfahrung bietet Rosenberger ein umfangreiches Portfolio, welches kontinuierlich optimiert wird.

 Energieversorgung: Power Hybrid

column5: {"keywords_english":{"1":"HSI connector system","2":"high-speed data transmission","3":"robust power transmission"},"keywords":{"1":"HSI connector system","2":"high-speed data transmission","3":"robust power transmission"}}
column6:
HSI - High-Speed Implement Bus System 
 HSI Connector System - Robust Power & Data Transmission Solutions for High-Speed Implement Bus Systems for All-Terrain, Agriculture and Construction Industries. 
 The demand for high-speed data transmission in harsh environment applications is constantly rising. From trucks, construction equipment to agricultural applications, Rosenberger has responded to these requirements with the development of the new HSI connector system. Designed for harsh conditions and standardized in cooperation with the AEF (Agricultural Industry Electronics Foundation), this is the new high performance standard. 
 In today‘s agriculture, reliable connections between tractors and trailers, seed, fertiliser and harvesting machines are essential. The challenges are not only terrain and weather conditions but also requirements for sustainable systems and potential savings. This requires connections with high power and data performance, as well as intelligent and digital data transmission for programming, measurement, evaluation, monitoring and positioning. 
 Rosenberger HSI connectors enable these and future tasks, such as GPS-controlled agriculture and coordinated data systems for various requirements. The HSI connector system is the standardized solution within the AEF, but is also suitable for other areas of application, including construction machinery and trucks confronted with demanding environmental requirements. 
 HSI – High-Speed Implement Bus System meets H-MTD Interface 
 Brand-new Hybrid Solution for Power and Data Transmission using a Cable Assembly HSI to H-MTD® from the Tractor unit to the Trailer-ECU 
 It stands for integrated solutions – ranging from the waterproof, flame-retardant, and UV-resistant HSI connector system for harsh environments to compact, waterproof high-speed data connectors (H-MTD®) mounted directly on the trailer ECU’s printed circuit board (PCB), (max. length 40 m). 
 Construction Industry 
 The HSI connector system is the standardized solution within the AEF, but is also suitable for other areas of application, including construction machinery, earth moving equipment, trucks and trailers confronted with demanding environmental requirements. 
 Agricultural Industry 
 In today‘s agriculture, reliable connections between tractors and trailers, seed, fertiliser and harvesting machines are essential. The challenges here are not only terrain and weather conditions but also requirements for sustainable systems and potential savings. 
 Agricultural industry, e. g. - GPS guided farming - Monitoring systems - Data systems for consumption, seed or fertiliser optimization - Level and tonnage measurements - All-Terrain areas and rough environment applications, e. g. - Construction machinery - Earth moving equipment - Trucks - Trailers - Cranes

column5: {"keywords_english":{"3":"Rosenberger VIA","2":"board-to-board RF interconnections","1":"Variable Interface Adaptor"},"keywords":{"3":"Rosenberger VIA","2":"board-to-board RF interconnections","1":"Variable Interface Adaptor"}}
column6:
Rosenberger’s series VIA® (Variable Interface Adaptor) is designed for board-to-board and board-to-module RF interconnections up to 6 GHz. The innovative mechanical design features both limited detent and smooth bore interfaces integrated into the adaptor – one side of the bullet is responsible for limited detent, the other side for smooth bore. The unique catch mechanism inside the adaptor ensures secure, reliable connection. 
 The Rosenberger VIA® covers all requirements for multiple connections and complex mobile communication solutions in remote radio heads (RRHs) as well as in various other applications.

Modern machine vision systems in automation and robotics demand the highest performance in image processing. Camera systems must transfer large volumes of data in real time, ensure stable signal quality, and operate reliably around the clock – even under harsh industrial conditions. 
 High-resolution cameras generate enormous data rates that cannot be transmitted seamlessly without a reliable connectivity solution. At the same time, the demand is growing for space-saving solutions that combine data and power transmission, minimize cabling complexity, and provide maximum flexibility in system design. 
 With HySpeedVision (HYV), Rosenberger offers an all-in-one connectivity technology designed specifically for machine vision: 
 
 High-speed data transmission in real time – for high-resolution camera signals 
 Multi-protocol compatibility – ensuring maximum flexibility in system design 
 Single-cable technology for data & power – significantly reducing cabling effort 
 
 Rugged and EMV-safe – built for reliable continuous operation in industrial environments. HySpeedVision combines superior signal quality with a space-saving design, ensuring smooth and efficient data flow between camera and computer. 
 The stable signal transmission of HYV ensures dependable performance even at high data rates. This guarantees secure real-time image processing — for maximum data security from the camera to the computer. Data connectors for reliable image processing — the basis for efficient automation and robotics. 
 Rosenberger delivers robust RF cable solutions for industrial camera integration – from robotics and drag chain systems to flexible cabling and fixed installations. 
 Our proven cable types offer: 
 
 Reliable signal quality with low attenuation 
 High torsion and cycle resistance 
 Compact, space-saving design 
 
 Engineered for dynamic movements and tight bending radii, Rosenberger cables ensure powerful, reliable, and future-ready data transmission in demanding machine vision environments. 
 High transmission performance with GMSL3 - Single-cable technology for data and power - Engineered for dynamic applications - Compact integration with minimal installation space - Industrial-grade reliability 
 GMSL1-3 - FDP-Link - APIX® - ASA Motion Link - USB - Further protocols on request 
 When developing modern machine vision systems, various factors are critical to bringing reliable and powerful products to market in an environment of high data rates and increasing miniaturization. 
 Rosenberger supports developers not only with innovative connectors for industrial applications but also with comprehensive expertise: 
 
 Design-in consulting for optimal integration 
 PCB footprint calculations for maximum precision 
 Powerful simulation tools for increased efficiency and validation 
 
 In addition to proven data connectors, Rosenberger offers simulations that ensure stable device communication and help implement cost-efficient and reliable systems. The result: a powerful peripheral infrastructure for the industrial image processing of tomorrow.

column5: {"keywords_english":{"3":"mixed card edge connections","2":"Rosenberger power inserts","1":"DIN 41626 coaxial inserts"},"keywords":{"3":"mixed card edge connections","2":"Rosenberger power inserts","1":"DIN 41626 coaxial inserts"}}
column6:
Rosenberger provides a variety of DIN 41626 coaxial and power inserts. Their small dimensions allow high packing densities with easy mixed card edge connection via the snap-in method. 
 
 
 1.0-2.3 DIN 41626 Coax Inserts 50 Ω are designed for use in mixed card edge connections in accordance to DIN 41612. Maximum frequency is approximately 2 GHz. 
 
 
 1.0-2.3 DIN 41626 Coax Inserts 75 Ω are similar to DIN 41626-T2 and are designed for use in mixed card edge connections in accordance to DIN 41612. Maximum frequency is approximately 1.5 GHz. The Rosenberger 50 Ω and 75 Ω 1.0-2.3 DIN inserts versions are intermateable but the 75 Ω solution is only available on request. 
 
 
 0.8-2.7 DIN 41626 Coax Inserts 75 Ω are similar to DIN 41626-T2 and are designed for use in mixed card edge connections in accordance to DIN 41612. Maximum frequency is approximately 1.5 GHz. The Rosenberger 1.0-2.3 DIN 50 Ω and 0.8-2.7 75 Ω inserts are not intermateable. Available on request. 
 
 
 Power Inserts meet the requirements of DIN 41626-T1 and are designed for use in mixed card edge connections in accordance with DIN 41612 or D-Sub. Contact current: 10 A, 20 A, 30 A, 40 A. Available on request. 
 
 
 Coax Inserts Impedance 50 Ω - Coax Inserts Impedance 75 Ω - Power-Inserts 10 A, 20 A, 30 A, 40 A - Mating cycles ≥ 500 - Interface according to DIN 41626-T2 - Plug-in/Snap-in DIN 41612 chassis 
 
 
 Coax Inserts Impedance 50 Ω Interface according to DIN 41626-T2, BS 9525 F0011 Frequency range DC to 2 GHz Return loss ≥ 20 dB (typ.) 
 
 
 Coax Inserts Impedance 75 Ω Interface according to DIN 41626-T2 Frequency range DC to 1.5 GHz Return loss ≥ 20 dB (typ.) 
 
 
 Power-Inserts Contact current 10 A, 20 A, 30 A, 40 A 
 
 
 Plug-in/Snap-in DIN 41612 chassis - High electrical and mechanical stability - Easy, fast and reliable connections in one connection 
 
 
 DIN 41626 coaxial and power inserts for chassis DIN 41612 – mixed card edge connections - Cable connectors for semi-rigid and flexible cables - Mainly applied in communications engineering

column6:
Un agitador coaxial se distingue por el hecho de que se utilizan al mismo tiempo dos sistemas de agitación completamente distintos. No sólo pueden ser distintas las revoluciones, sino también los sentidos de giro. Los dispositivos agitadores se pueden combinar libremente. 
 Más información 
 Enviar solicitud 
 Modelo estándar 
 
 Variaciones de accionamiento, en su mayoría con reductores de engranajes cónicos y engranajes rectos - Diferentes posibilidades de obturación - Combinable con ejes y dispositivos agitadores RVT 
 
 Ámbito de aplicación 
 
 Diferentes sistemas de agitación al mismo tiempo con un solo agitador 
 
 Ventajas 
 
 Es posible ajustar intervalos de revoluciones muy diferentes en ambos sistemas agitadores - Posibilidad de dos sentidos de giro diferentes

 Dependiendo del tipo de junta, son aptos para aire TA, CIP/SIP, GMP/FDA. Se cubren los campos de aplicación más diferentes gracias al elevado número de obturaciones que se pueden instalar. Algunos requerimientos especiales son:

 Fluidos tóxicos 
 Depósitos herméticos 
 
 Sus ventajas: 
 
 Puede elegir variantes de obturación muy diferentes 
 Disponibilidad de piezas de desgaste segura y a corto plazo.

column5: {"keywords_english":{"1":"RVT Locking Pressure Systems","2":"sliding ring seals","3":"high pressure"},"keywords":{"1":"Sistemas de presión de bloqueo RVT","2":"juntas de anillo deslizante","3":"alta presión"}}
column6: Con los sistemas de presión de bloqueo RVT se pueden alimentar juntas de anillo deslizante sencillas y dobles en una gran gama de aplicaciones. El dimensionamiento, diseño y fabricación se realizan conforme a la directiva de equipos de presión PED 2014/68/UE o la norma EN 13445 y las hojas informativas AD 2000. El sistema de presión de bloqueo RVT con serpentín de refrigeración sirve para alimentar y refrigerar el líquido de bloqueo. Una generación de presión mediante gas, por ejemplo N2, es posible en cualquier momento. Los multiplicadores de presión RVT son especialmente aptos para aplicaciones de alta presión. Mediante una relación de multiplicación se garantiza una diferencia de presión constante en la junta y se reduce considerablemente su desgaste. También se pueden suministrar grupos de presión de bloqueo por separado con un diseño especial adaptado a la correspondiente aplicación.

column5: {"keywords_english":{"3":"Stainless Steel Components","2":"Shot Blasting","1":"Surface Treatment"},"keywords":{"3":"Componentes de acero inoxidable","2":"Granallado","1":"Tratamiento de superficie"}}
column6:
Además de nuestra amplia gama de productos y servicios, también ofrecemos el tratamiento superficial de componentes por granallado, en fabricación por contrato. 
 En este proceso, el material de voladura se lanza a la superficie del componente con la ayuda de aire comprimido. 
 Se utiliza para reforzar, dar rugosidad, matear y, en particular, limpiar las superficies de los componentes. Podemos hacer esto internamente en nuestra propia cabina de voladura, lo que permite tiempos de producción rápidos y una gran flexibilidad. 
 Somos conocidos en toda Europa por nuestra alta calidad. 
 Ámbito de aplicación 
 
 Procesamiento de superficies de componentes de acero inoxidable o, si es necesario, aceros de mayor calidad 
 Eliminación eficiente de incrustaciones, suciedad, decoloración, residuos de pintura, etc. 
 Es posible la eliminación de rebabas ligeras e irregularidades superficiales - rugosidad de la superficie 
 Mecanizado de componentes de hasta 3000 mm (L) x 1500 mm (W) x 1500 MM (H) y mayores posibles bajo pedido 
 
 Ventajas 
 
 Pretratamiento/desbastado de la superficie para mejorar la adherencia para el posterior recubrimiento/pintura 
 El granallado proporciona a los componentes una superficie brillante/mate visualmente atractiva 
 Proceso rápido y económico

Affordable 
 Low weight 
 Short delivery time 
 Common series available in stock

column5: {"keywords_english":{"3":"adjustable angle","2":"removable wing blades","1":"inclined blade mixer"},"keywords":{"3":"verstellbarer Anstellwinkel","2":"abnehmbare Flügelblätter","1":"Schrägblattrührer"}}

In addition to our wide range of products and services, we also offer the surface treatment of components by blasting, in contract manufacturing. 
 In this process, blasting material is shot at the component surface with the help of compressed air. 
 This is used for strengthening, roughening, matting and, in particular, cleaning component surfaces. We can do this in-house in our own blasting cabin, which allows for fast throughput times and great flexibility. 
 We are known throughout Europe for our high quality. 
 For further Information 
 Send Inquiry 
 Standard design 
 We use a special RVT special mixture of glass beads and corundum as standard blasting material. This means that high-quality surfaces can be produced economically. 
 However, unmixed glass beads or corundum can also be used. 
 Operating range 
 
 Surface processing of components made of stainless steel or, if necessary, higher-quality steels 
 Efficient removal of scale, dirt, discoloration, paint residue, etc.

 Vaciado en el punto más bajo de la junta

Las formas complejas y el ángulo de incidencia de los dispositivos agitadores permiten un consumo de energía eficiente durante el proceso de agitación. Desde nuestros modelos estándar hasta nuestros diseños especiales, le ayudamos a optimizar su proceso de agitación. Otorgamos la mayor importancia a las uniones fiables entre el dispositivo agitador y el eje para lograr una transmisión segura de las fuerzas y pares, así como un montaje sencillo y unas necesidades reducidas de mantenimiento. 
 
 Tarea de agitación adaptable individualmente

Mit RVT-Sperrdrucksystemen können einfach- und doppeltwirkende Gleitringdichtungen in einem großen Einsatzspektrum versorgt werden. 
 Auslegung, Konstruktion und Herstellung erfolgt nach Druckgeräterichtlinie PED 2014/68/EU bzw. EN 13445 und AD 2000 - Merkblättern. 
 Das RVT- Sperrdrucksystem mit Kühlschlange dient zur Bevorratung und Kühlung der Sperrflüssigkeit.Eine Druckbeaufschlagung mittels Gas, z. B. N2 ist jederzeit möglich. 
 RVT Druckübersetzer sind besonders gut für Hochdruckanwendungen geeignet. 
 Über ein Übersetzungsverhältnis wird ein konstanter Differenzdruck an der Dichtung gewährleistet und verringert deren Verschleiß erheblich. 
 Es können auch separate Sperrdruckaggregate in anwendungsbezogener Sonderkonstruktion geliefert werden.

Neben unserem weiten Produkt- und Leistungsspektrum bieten wir auch die Oberflächenbearbeitung von Bauteilen durch Strahlen, in der Lohnfertigung an. 
 Bei diesem Verfahren wird Strahlgut mit Hilfe von Druckluft auf die Bauteiloberfläche geschossen. 
 Verwendung findet dieses bei der Verfestigung, dem Aufrauhen, Mattieren und insbesondere dem Reinigen von Bauteiloberflächen. Dies können wir werksintern in unserer eigenen Strahlkabine durchführen, wodurch sich schnelle Durchlaufzeiten und eine große Flexibilität realisieren lassen. 
 Für unsere hohe Qualität sind wir europaweit bekannt. 
 Für weitere Information 
 Anfrage senden 
 Standardausführung 
 Als Standard Strahlgut verwenden wir eine spezielle RVT Sondermischung aus Glasperlen- und Korund. Dadurch lassen sich wirtschaftlich, hochwertige Oberflächen herstellen. 
 Es kann jedoch auch Glasperlen oder Korund ungemischt verwendet werden. 
 Einsatzbereich 
 
 Oberflächenbearbeitung von Bauteilen aus Edelstahl oder ggf. auch höherwertigen Stählen 
 Effizientes Entfernen von Zunder, Verschmutzungen, Verfärbungen, Lackresten, etc. 
 Entfernung von leichten Graten und Oberflächenunregelmäßigkeiten möglich 
 Aufrauhung der Oberfläche 
 Bearbeitung von Bauteilen bis zu 3000 mm (L) x 1500 mm (B) x 1500 MM (H) und größere auf Anfrage möglich 
 
 Vorteile 
 
 Vorbehandlung / Aufrauhung der Oberfläche als Verbesserung der Haftung für nachfolgendes Beschichten/Lackieren 
 Durch das Strahlen erhalten Bauteile eine optisch ansprechende, helle/matte Oberfläche 
 Schnelles, wirtschaftliches Verfahren

With the RVT pressure intensifier you can guarantee a constant pressure difference on the seal with a transmission ratio. The input pressure at the pressure intensifier corresponds to the boiler pressure. 
 Standard design 
 
 Hand pump 
 Manometer (usually with a contact) 
 Fill level monitor of minimum and maximum value 
 Overpressure valve 
 
 Advantages 
 
 Gentle on the seal unit, because differential pressure is only approximately 2 to 5 bar(g) 
 Compact design 
 Simple refilling by hand pump 
 Separate cooling with integrated cooling hose possible 
 Affordable

column5: {"keywords_english":{"1":"RVT pressurisation system","2":"high-pressure applications","3":"pressure intensifiers"},"keywords":{"1":"RVT pressurisation system","2":"high-pressure applications","3":"pressure intensifiers"}}
column6: Simple and double-acting slide ring seals can be supplied with RVT pressurisation systems in alarge range of applications. Configuration, design and production take place in accordance with the Pressure Equipment Directive PED 2014/68/EU and/or EN 13445 and AD 2000 information sheets. The RVT pressurisation system with cooling hose is provided for the storage and cooling of the sealing liquid. Pressurisation with gas, e.g N2 is possible at any time. RVT pressure intensifiers are especially well-suited for high-pressure applications. A constant differential pressure at the seal is assured with a transmission ratio and wear is reduced considerably. Separate sealing pressure devices can also be supplied in a user-specific special design.
